TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp extends System.Object

summary.span: 配置 绑定的消息级安全性。

span.span: Configures the message-level security of the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含的属性可为客户端和服务之间的各个安全配置方面提供控制，包括与服务期望客户端从中检索联合凭据的颁发者相关的详细信息。This class contains properties that provide control over various aspects of the security configuration between the client and the service, including details related to the issuer from which the service expects the client to retrieve a federated credential.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定消息加密算法和密钥换行算法的算法套件。

span.span: Gets or sets the algorithm suite that specifies the message encryption and key-wrap algorithms.

value.span: 指定消息加密和密钥换行算法的算法组。

span.span: The algorithm suite that specifies the message encryption and key-wrap algorithms.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的 对象包含大量属性，这些属性指定要在特定条件下使用的安全算法。The object that is returned contains numerous properties that specify security algorithms to use in specific conditions. 它还描述该服务的各种安全功能。It also describes various security capabilities of the service. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何从绑定中访问此属性并设置它。The following code shows how to access this property from the binding, and set it. summary.span: 获取此绑定的 实例的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the instances for this binding.
A of type .
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务使用此属性返回的集合来指定任何必选和可选声明，这些声明必须位于客户端用于访问服务的已颁发令牌中。The collection returned by this property is used by the service to specify any required and optional claims which must be in the issued token the client uses to access the service. 如果 WSDL 发布已启用但 WCF 并不要求已颁发的令牌包含指定的声明类型，则服务将会在元数据中公开所需的声明类型。The service exposes the required claim types in metadata if WSDL publishing is enabled but WCF does not require the issued token contain the specified claim types. 希望强制显示所需声明类型的服务应该使用授权策略。Services wishing to enforce required claim types are present should do using authorization policy. 在联合客户端上，此集合包含必选和可选声明的列表，该列表将发送到客户端请求已颁发令牌的 security token service。On federated clients this collection contains the list of required and optional claims which is sent to the security token service in the client's request for an issued token. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何从绑定中访问此属性并设置它。The following code shows how to access this property from the binding, and set it. [!code-csharp[WSFederationHttpSecurity#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/cs/source.cs#11)] [!code-vb[WSFederationHttpSecurity#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/vb/source.vb#11)]

summary.span: 指定应该由安全令牌服务颁发的令牌类型。

span.span: Specifies the type of token which should be issued by the security token service.
The type of token to be issued.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它会导致 WCF 从 STS 中请求 SAML 安全令牌。

span.span: The default is , which causes WCF to request a SAML security token from the STS.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示服务期望的令牌类型并控制在服务中创建哪个 SecurityTokenAuthenticator。This property indicates the type of token that the service expects and controls which SecurityTokenAuthenticator is created on the service. 在客户端上，它控制发送到客户端的已颁发令牌的 security token service 的类型。On the client it controls the type which is sent to the security token service in the client's request for an issued token. IssuedTokenType 通常采用 URI 的形式。The IssuedTokenType typically takes the form of a URI. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何从绑定中访问此属性并设置它。The following code shows how to access this property from the binding, and set it. [!code-csharp[WSFederationHttpSecurity#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WSFederationHttpSecurity#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/vb/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置颁发服务凭据的安全令牌服务的终结点地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the endpoint address of the security token service that issues credentials for the service.
The of the security token service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此地址将用作颁发服务凭据的安全令牌服务的终结点。This address is used as the endpoint for the security token service that issues credentials for the service. 如果 WSDL 已启用但不另作他用，则服务会在元数据中公开颁发者的地址。Services expose the issuer address in metadata if WSDL is enabled but make no other use of it. 客户端使用此颁发者地址与安全令牌服务通信。Clients use the issuer address to communicate with the security token service. 如果 IssuerAddress 为 Null，客户端可以恢复使用通过 IssuedTokenClientCredential 中的 LocalIssuerAddress 和 LocalIssuerBinding 属性指定的安全令牌服务。If the IssuerAddress is null clients may fall back to using the security token service specified via the LocalIssuerAddress and LocalIssuerBinding properties on IssuedTokenClientCredential. 在某些特定情况下，如果 ClientCredentials.SupportInteractive 为 true，则在客户端上将此值设置为 `null` 或 WS-AddressingIdentity 匿名 URI 将激活 CardSpace。Setting this value to `null` or the WS-AddressingIdentity anonymous URI on the client causes CardSpace to activate if ClientCredentials.SupportInteractive is true under certain circumstances. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何从绑定中访问此属性并设置它。The following code shows how to access this property from the binding, and set it. [!code-csharp[WSFederationHttpSecurity#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/cs/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[WSFederationHttpSecurity#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/vb/source.vb#8)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当与终结点地址为 的安全令牌服务通信时客户端所使用的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding to be used by the client when communicating with the security token service whose endpoint address equals .

value.span: 与安全令牌服务通信时客户端所使用的 。

span.span: The to be used by the client when communicating with the security token service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定在获取服务凭据时客户端要在客户端和安全令牌服务之间使用的绑定。This property is used to specify the binding that is used by the client between the client and the security token service when obtaining credentials for the service. 请注意，无需在服务中填充此属性，因为它仅供客户端使用。Note that this property does not need to be populated on the service, since it is only consumed by the client. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何从绑定中访问此属性并设置它。The following code shows how to access this property from the binding, and set it. [!code-csharp[WSFederationHttpSecurity#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/cs/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[WSFederationHttpSecurity#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/vb/source.vb#9)]

span.span: The to be used when communicating with the security token service out of band.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此地址用作颁发带外服务凭据的安全令牌服务的终结点。This address is used as the endpoint for the security token service that issues credentials for the service out of band. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何从绑定中访问此属性并设置它。The following code shows how to access this property from the binding, and set it. summary.span: 指定是否已进行消息级 SSL 协商以获取服务的证书。

span.span: Specifies whether a message level SSL negotiation is done to obtain the service's certificate.

value.span: 如果已协商服务证书，则为 ；如果可以在带外使用服务证书，则为 。

span.span: if the service certificate is negotiated; if the service certificate is available out of band.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示是否在客户端和服务之间自动协商服务证书。This property indicates whether the service certificate is negotiated automatically between the client and the service. 如果此属性为 `true`，则会进行此类协商。If this property is `true`, then such negotiation occurs. 如果此属性为 `false`，则与服务通信之前必须在客户端指定服务证书。If this property is `false`, then the service certificate must be specified at the client before communication with the service can occur. 服务必须始终指定一个证书。Services must always specify a certificate. 如果此属性为 true，则在请求通过 IssuerAddress 和 IssuerBinding 属性指定的安全令牌服务颁布安全令牌之前，将进行服务证书的消息级 SSL 协商。If this property is true, the message level SSL negotiation for the service certificate occurs before the security token service specified via the IssuerAddress and IssuerBinding properties (or LocalIssuerAddress and LocalIssuerBinding properties) is requested to issue a security token. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何从绑定中访问此属性并设置它。The following code shows how to access this property from the binding, and set it. [!code-csharp[WSFederationHttpSecurity#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/cs/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WSFederationHttpSecurity#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/vb/source.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取请求令牌时要在消息正文中发送到安全令牌服务中的 XML 元素的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of XML elements to be sent in the message body to the security token service when requesting a token.
A of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的集合可用来指定请求令牌时要在消息正文中发送至安全令牌服务的其他 XML 元素。The collection returned by this property can be used to specify additional XML elements to be sent in the message body to the security token service when requesting a token.
